attributes.action: Call a General Election if in the event of a petition receiving over 1 million signatures, it is not taken note of and action taken to ensure the petitioners views are properly represented and acted upon.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having created this "Petition website to listen to the views of the ordinary people" the Prime minister should call a General Election in the event that his government disregards such a substantial petition.

Any petition that receives over one million signaturies should result in action being taken to address the situation, either by an open vote in the commons or a referendum.

To create this site and to then ignore/not act upon the results would be a travesty and hypocritical.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
